bot_answers.start:
Hello! This Bot will make a clip (actually a slideshow) for your song, using the open image generating neural networks.

In order to start, we want you to answer some questions. You can answer them using the command "/set_network", "/set_artist", "/set_song", "/set_style".

You can start the process of creating a clip with "/clip" command.
bot_answers.rudalle_choice: You have chosen ruDALL-E to handle your video clip
bot_answers.diffusion_choice: You have chosen Diffusion to handle your video clip
bot_answers.midjourney_choice: You have chosen MidJourney to handle your video clip
bot_answers.clip_command:
The clipping process has started.
Your place in the queue: NaN
bot_answers.no_user_reply:
You are not in the users table.
Please use the /start command to be add to the table

sql_queries.create_table:
CREATE TABLE "Users" (
	"Id"	TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
	"Artist"	TEXT,
	"Song"	TEXT,
	"Network"	TEXT,
	"Style"	TEXT,
	"Status"	TEXT,
	"Position"	INTEGER,
	PRIMARY KEY("Id")
);
